Text:
This absolutely works. However, it won't install on 64bit systems (mine's windows 7 64bit). However again, you can install Windows Virtual PC and Windows XP Mode on Windows 7. Run XP Mode then install this download.

However again, it won't run because it will look for the CD. I've tried making an ISO out of the files and loading it through PowerISO but it didn't work. 

So you have to burn everything on a CD and then afterwards you can run it. Works great!

Thanks to the uploader! :D
